description: /b/Functional Flowers/b/ can pull mana from /b/Mana Pools/b/ and start causing things to happen!
They will pull from the closest /b/Mana Pool/b/ in range, but can be rebinded if necessary. Installing a /b/Redstone Root/b/ allows for /6/redstone control/6/ of the flower.
Refer to the /b/Lexica Botanica/b/'s section on Functional Flora for a comprehensive and discriptive list.
